desc: The Guardsmen of San Francisco ? request your presence at their ? Annual?Christmas?Tree?Lot?Party Come enjoy a hosted bar, top DJ, dancing? in an indoor winter wonderland. The Guardsmen make a life-changing difference in the lives of at-risk youth by raising funds for scholarship, campership and other youth programs. We mobilize the talents, energy and resources of our members, friends, families, and professional colleagues, and in so doing strengthen our entire community.
